00079  struct ZIP_API Info
00080  {
00081   DWORD m_uCentrDirPos; 
00082   DWORD m_uBytesBeforeZip;
00083   WORD m_uThisDisk;  
00084   WORD m_uDiskWithCD;  
00085   WORD m_uDiskEntriesNo; 
00086   WORD m_uEntriesNumber; 
00087   DWORD m_uSize;   
00088   DWORD m_uOffset;  
00089 
00090 
00091   bool m_bOnDisk;   
00092 
00093  protected:
00094   friend class CZipCentralDir;
00095   bool CheckIfOK_1()
00096   {
00097    return ((DWORD)m_uCentrDirPos >= m_uOffset + m_uSize);
00098   }
00099   void SetBytesBeforeZip(bool bIsSpan)
00100   {
00101    m_uBytesBeforeZip = bIsSpan ? 0 : m_uCentrDirPos - m_uSize - m_uOffset;
00102   }
00103   bool CheckIfOK_2()
00104   {
00105    return (m_uSize || !m_uEntriesNumber) && (m_uEntriesNumber || !m_uSize);
00106   }
00107   void DiskChange(int iCurrentDisk)
00108   {
00109    m_uThisDisk = (WORD)iCurrentDisk;
00110    if (m_uEntriesNumber)
00111    {
00112     m_uDiskEntriesNo = 0; 
00113    }
00114    else
00115    {
00116     m_uDiskWithCD = m_uThisDisk;
00117     m_uOffset = 0;
00118    }
00119   }
00120  };

00175  void RemoveLastFile(CZipFileHeader* pHeader = NULL, int iIndex = -1)
00176  {
00177   if (iIndex == -1)
00178   {
00179    iIndex = m_headers.GetSize() - 1;
00180    if (iIndex == -1)
00181     return;
00182   }
00183   if (!pHeader)
00184    pHeader = m_headers[iIndex];
00185   DWORD uNewSize = pHeader->m_uOffset + GetBytesBefore();
00186   // then remove
00187   RemoveFile(pHeader, iIndex);
00188 
00189   m_pStorage->Flush();
00190   m_pStorage->m_pFile->SetLength(uNewSize);
00191   m_info.m_bOnDisk = false; // it is true when AutoFlush is set to true
00192  }
00193

00224  CZipString GetProperHeaderFileName(const CZipFileHeader* pHeader) const
00225  {
00226   if (!m_bConvertAfterOpen)
00227   {
00228    CZipFileHeader fh = *pHeader;
00229    ConvertFileName(true, false, &fh);
00230    return fh.GetFileName();
00231   }
00232   else
00233    return pHeader->GetFileName();
00234  }

00286  int GetFindFastIndex(int iFindFastIndex)const
00287  {
00288   if (!IsValidIndex(iFindFastIndex) || !m_bFindFastEnabled)
00289   {
00290  //   ASSERT(FALSE); // 
00291    return -1;
00292   }
00293   
00294   return m_findarray[iFindFastIndex].m_uIndex;
00295  }

00377  void ConvertFileName(bool bFromZip, bool bAfterOpen, CZipFileHeader* pHeader = NULL) const
00378  {
00379   if (bAfterOpen != m_bConvertAfterOpen)
00380    return;
00381   if (!pHeader)
00382   {
00383    pHeader = m_pOpenedFile;
00384    ASSERT(pHeader);
00385   }
00386   ZipCompatibility::FileNameUpdate(*pHeader, bFromZip, m_bOemConversion);
00387  }

00406  DWORD GetBytesBefore() const {return m_info.m_uBytesBeforeZip;}
00410  void GetInfo(Info& info) const {info = m_info;}
00414  bool IsFindFastEnabled(){return m_bFindFastEnabled;}
00418  void RenameFile(WORD uIndex, LPCTSTR lpszNewName);
00419 protected:
00423  void SortHeaders();
00424  static int CompareHeaders(const void *pArg1, const void *pArg2)
00425  {
00426   CZipFileHeader* pw1 = *(CZipFileHeader**)pArg1;
00427   CZipFileHeader* pw2 = *(CZipFileHeader**)pArg2;
00428   if ((pw1->m_uOffset < pw2->m_uOffset && pw1->m_uDiskStart == pw2->m_uDiskStart)
00429    || (pw1->m_uDiskStart < pw2->m_uDiskStart))
00430    return -1;
00431   else if ((pw1->m_uOffset > pw2->m_uOffset && pw1->m_uDiskStart == pw2->m_uDiskStart)
00432    || (pw1->m_uDiskStart > pw2->m_uDiskStart))
00433    return 1;
00434   else
00435   {
00436    ASSERT(FALSE);
00437    // two files with the same offsets on the same disk???
00438    CZipException::Throw(CZipException::badZipFile);
00439    return 0; // just for the compiler comfort
00440   }
00441  }
